00287       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\DeliveryLocation.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00288       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDeliveryLocation));
00289 
00290       // load the Flower frame graphic and add it
00291       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00292       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\FlowerFrame.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00293       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFlowerFrame));
00294

00296       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;

00298       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPersonalSentiments));
00299 
00300       // load the Name Box graphic and add it
00301       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;

00303       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiNameBox));
00304 
00305       // load the Check Box graphic and add it

00308       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage));
00309 
00310       // load the currently selected flower bouquet
00311       sprintf( sTemp, "LAPTOP\\Flower_%d.sti", guiCurrentlySelectedFlower);

00313       FilenameForBPP( sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00314       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCurrentlySelectedFlowerImage));
00315 
00316 
00317   // border

00399       usWidth = StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_STANDARDIZED_CARDS], FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT);
00400       usHeight = GetFontHeight(FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT);
00401       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristCardGalleryLinkRegion, usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_Y, (UINT16)(usPosX + usWidth), (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_Y + usHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00402                                      CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristCardGalleryLinkRegionCallBack ); 
00403       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristCardGalleryLinkRegion); 
00404 
00405 
00406       //flower link
00407       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristGalleryLinkRegion, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_Y, (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_X + FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_Y + FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00408                                CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristGalleryLinkRegionCallBack ); 
00409       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristGalleryLinkRegion); 
00410 
00411       //drop down city location
00412       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristDropDownRegion, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_X, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y, (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_X + FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y + FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00413                                CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristDropDownRegionCallBack); 
00414       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristDropDownRegion); 
00415 
00416             //to disable the drop down city location
00417       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2,
00418                                CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristDisableDropDownRegionCallBack); 
00419       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion); 
00420   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion); 
00421 
00422 
00423       //to select typing in the personal sentiment box
00424 //    MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFloristPersonalSentimentBoxRegion, FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_Y, (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_X + FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_WIDTH), (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_Y + FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00425 //                             CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectFloristPersonalSentimentBoxRegionCallBack); 
00426 //    MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedFloristPersonalSentimentBoxRegion ); 
00427 
00428       InitFlowerOrderTextInputBoxes();
00429 
00430       LaptopSaveInfo.uiFlowerOrderNumber += Random( 5 ) + 1;
00431       
00432       RenderFloristOrderForm();
00433 
00434 //    guiFlowerPrice = 0;
00435 //    gubFlowerDestDropDownMode = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
00436 //    gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation = 0;
00437 
00438       return(TRUE);
00439 }

00441 void InitFloristOrderFormVariables()
00442 {
00443       guiFlowerPrice = 0;
00444       gubFlowerDestDropDownMode = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
00445       gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation = 0;
00446 }

00449 void ExitFloristOrderForm()
00450 {
00451       UINT8 i;
00452       RemoveFloristDefaults();
00453 
00454       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiDeliveryLocation );
00455       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiFlowerFrame );
00456       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiNameBox );
00457       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiPersonalSentiments );
00458       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage );
00459       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCurrentlySelectedFlowerImage );
00460       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDropDownBorder);
00461 
00462       for(i=0; i<6; i++)
00463             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristCheckBoxRegion[i]);
00464 
00465       //card gallery link
00466       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristCardGalleryLinkRegion);
00467 
00468       //flower link
00469       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristGalleryLinkRegion);
00470 
00471       //flower link
00472       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristDropDownRegion);
00473 
00474       //to select typing in the personal sentiment box
00475 //    MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristPersonalSentimentBoxRegion);
00476 
00477       //disable the drop down window
00478       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion);
00479 
00480       UnloadButtonImage( guiFlowerOrderButtonImage );
00481 
00482       RemoveButton( guiFlowerOrderBackButton );
00483       RemoveButton( guiFlowerOrderSendButton );
00484       RemoveButton( guiFlowerOrderClearButton );
00485       RemoveButton( guiFlowerOrderGalleryButton );
00486 
00487       //Store the text fields
00488       Get16BitStringFromField( 1, gsSentimentTextField );
00489       Get16BitStringFromField( 2, gsNameTextField );
00490       gbCurrentlySelectedCard = -1;
00491 
00492 
00493       DestroyFlowerOrderTextInputBoxes();
00494 }

00496 void HandleFloristOrderForm()
00497 {
00498       if( gubFlowerDestDropDownMode != FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION )
00499       {
00500             CreateDestroyFlowerOrderDestDropDown( gubFlowerDestDropDownMode );
00501       }
00502       HandleFloristOrderKeyBoardInput();
00503 
00504       RenderAllTextFields();
00505 }
00506 
00507 void RenderFloristOrderForm()
00508 {
00509   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00510       UINT16 usPosX;
00511       wchar_t           sTemp[ 640 ];
00512       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00513 
00514       DisplayFloristDefaults();
00515 
00516       //The flowe Delivery location
00517       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiDeliveryLocation);
00518       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_X, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00519 
00520       //The flowe Flower Frame
00521       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerFrame);
00522       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00523 
00524       //The currenltly selected flwoer
00525       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiCurrentlySelectedFlowerImage);
00526       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_X+5, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_BOX_Y+5, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00527 
00528       //The flowe Name Box
00529       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiNameBox);
00530       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00531 
00532 
00533       //The flowe Personel sentiments
00534       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiPersonalSentiments);
00535       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00536 
00537       //Bouquet name, price and order number,text
00538       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_NAME_BOUQUET], FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_NAME_X, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00539       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_PRICE], FLOWER_ORDER_BOUQUET_NAME_X, FLOWER_ORDER_BOUQUET_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00540       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_ORDER_NUMBER], FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_X, FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00541 
00542       //The flower name
00543       usPosX = StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_NAME_BOUQUET], FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT) + 5 + FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_NAME_X;
00544       uiStartLoc = FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TOTAL_SIZE * guiCurrentlySelectedFlower;
00545       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE);
00546       DrawTextToScreen( sTemp, usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_FLOWER_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00547 
00548 
00549 
00550       
00551       //Deliverry Date
00552       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_DELIVERY_DATE], FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_X, FLOWER_ORDER_DATE_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00553 
00554       //Next day
00555       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_NEXT_DAY], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00556 
00557       //When it get there
00558       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_GETS_THERE], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00559 
00560       //Deliverry locatiuon
00561       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION], FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_X, FLOWER_ORDER_LOCATION_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00562 
00563       //Additional services
00564       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_ADDITIONAL_CHARGES], FLOWER_ORDER_ADDITIONAL_SERVICES_X, FLOWER_ORDER_ADDITIONAL_SERVICES_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00565 
00566       //crushed bouquet
00567       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_CRUSHED], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00568 
00569       //black roses
00570       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_BLACK_ROSES], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00571 
00572       //wilted bouquet
00573       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_WILTED], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00574 
00575       //fruit cake
00576       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_FRUIT_CAKE], FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_X+FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_WIDTH+3, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00577 
00578 
00579       //Personal sentiment
00580       usPosX = FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_X + StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENTIMENTS], FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT) + 5;
00581       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENTIMENTS], FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_X, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00582       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_CARD_LENGTH], usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_Y+2, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_TINY_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00583 
00584       //Billing information
00585       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_BILLING_INFO], FLOWER_ORDER_BILLING_INFO_X, FLOWER_ORDER_BILLING_INFO_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00586 
00587       //Billing Name
00588       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_NAME], FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_X, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_Y, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_WIDTH, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
00589 
00590       //the text to link to the card gallery
00591       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_SELECT_FROM_OURS], FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_X, FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00592       usPosX = StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_SELECT_FROM_OURS], FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT) + 5 + FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_X;
00593       DrawTextToScreen(sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_STANDARDIZED_CARDS], usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_LINK_TO_CARD_GALLERY_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_BIG_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_LINK_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00594 
00595       DisplayFloristCheckBox();
00596 
00597       //display all the things that change for the different bouquet collections
00598       DisplayFlowerDynamicItems();
00599 
00600       //Display the currently selected city
00601       FlowerOrderDisplayShippingLocationCity();
00602 
00603   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00604       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00605   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00606 }

00609 
00610 void BtnFlowerOrderBackButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00611 {
00612       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00613       {
00614             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00615             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00616       }
00617       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00618       {
00619             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00620             {
00621                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00622 
00623                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY;
00624 
00625                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00626             }
00627       }
00628       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00629       {
00630             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00631             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00632       }
00633 } 
00634 
00635 void BtnFlowerOrderSendButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00636 {
00637       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00638       {
00639             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00640             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00641       }
00642       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00643       {
00644             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00645             {
00646                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00647 
00648                   //add an entry in the finacial page for the medical deposit
00649                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  PURCHASED_FLOWERS, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), -(INT32)(guiFlowerPrice) );
00650 
00651                   if ( gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation == 7 )
00652                   {
00653                         // sent to meduna!
00654                         if ( gfFLoristCheckBox0Down )
00655                         {
00656                               HandleFlowersMeanwhileScene( 0 );
00657                         }
00658                         else
00659                         {
00660                               HandleFlowersMeanwhileScene( 1 );
00661                         }
00662                   }
00663 
00664                   //increment the order number
00665                   LaptopSaveInfo.uiFlowerOrderNumber += ( 1 + Random( 2 ) );
00666 
00667                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
00668                   InitFloristOrderForm();
00669 
00670                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00671             }
00672       }
00673       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00674       {
00675             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00676             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00677       }
00678 } 
00679 
00680 void BtnFlowerOrderClearButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00681 {
00682       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00683       {
00684             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00685             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00686       }
00687       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00688       {
00689             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00690             {
00691                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00692 
00693                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST;
00694                   InitFloristOrderForm();
00695 
00696                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00697             }
00698       }
00699       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00700       {
00701             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00702             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00703       }
00704 }

00706 void BtnFlowerOrderGalleryButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00707 {
00708       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00709       {
00710             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00711             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00712       }
00713       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00714       {
00715             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00716             {
00717                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00718 
00719                   guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_FLORIST_FLOWER_GALLERY;
00720 
00721                   //reset the gallery back to page 0
00722                   gubCurFlowerIndex = 0;
00723 
00724                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00725             }
00726       }
00727       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00728       {
00729             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00730             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00731       }
00732 } 
00733 
00734 
00735 void SelectFlorsitCheckBoxRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00736 { 
00737       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00738       {
00739       }
00740       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00741       {
00742             UINT32      uiUserData;
00743 
00744             uiUserData = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00745 
00746             switch( uiUserData )
00747             {
00748                   case 0:
00749                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox0Down )
00750                         {
00751                               gfFLoristCheckBox0Down = FALSE;
00752                               gfFLoristCheckBox1Down = TRUE;
00753                         }
00754                         else
00755                         {
00756                               gfFLoristCheckBox0Down = TRUE;
00757                               gfFLoristCheckBox1Down = FALSE;
00758                         }
00759                         break;
00760                   case 1:
00761                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox1Down )
00762                         {
00763                               gfFLoristCheckBox1Down = FALSE;
00764                               gfFLoristCheckBox0Down = TRUE;
00765                         }
00766                         else
00767                         {
00768                               gfFLoristCheckBox1Down = TRUE;
00769                               gfFLoristCheckBox0Down = FALSE;
00770                         }
00771                         break;
00772                   case 2:
00773                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox2Down )
00774                               gfFLoristCheckBox2Down = FALSE;
00775                         else
00776                               gfFLoristCheckBox2Down = TRUE;
00777                         break;
00778                   case 3:
00779                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox3Down )
00780                               gfFLoristCheckBox3Down = FALSE;
00781                         else
00782                               gfFLoristCheckBox3Down = TRUE;
00783                         break;
00784                   case 4:
00785                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox4Down )
00786                               gfFLoristCheckBox4Down = FALSE;
00787                         else
00788                               gfFLoristCheckBox4Down = TRUE;
00789                         break;
00790                   case 5:
00791                         if( gfFLoristCheckBox5Down )
00792                               gfFLoristCheckBox5Down = FALSE;
00793                         else
00794                               gfFLoristCheckBox5Down = TRUE;
00795                         break;
00796             }
00797             DisplayFloristCheckBox();
00798             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00799       }
00800       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00801       {
00802       } 
00803 }
00804 
00805 void DisplayFloristCheckBox()
00806 {
00807   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00808 
00809       //check box
00810       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00811       if( gfFLoristCheckBox0Down )
00812             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_X, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00813       else
00814             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_X, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_0_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00815 
00816       //first check box
00817       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00818       if( gfFLoristCheckBox1Down )
00819             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_X, FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00820       else
00821             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_1_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00822 
00823       //second check box
00824       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00825       if( gfFLoristCheckBox2Down )
00826             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00827       else
00828             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_2_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00829 
00830       //third check box
00831       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00832       if( gfFLoristCheckBox3Down )
00833             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00834       else
00835             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_3_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00836 
00837       //Foiurth check box
00838       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00839       if( gfFLoristCheckBox4Down )
00840             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00841       else
00842             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_4_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00843 
00844       //fifth check box
00845       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiFlowerOrderCheckBoxButtonImage);
00846       if( gfFLoristCheckBox5Down )
00847             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 1,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00848       else
00849             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_X,  FLOWER_ORDER_CHECK_BOX_5_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00850 
00851   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00852 }

00871 
00872 //display the things that change on the screen
00873 void DisplayFlowerDynamicItems()
00874 {
00875       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00876       UINT16      usPosX;
00877       wchar_t     sTemp[ 640 ];
00878 //    wchar_t     sText[ 640 ];
00879       UINT16      usPrice;
00880 /*
00881       //display the card saying
00882       if( gbCurrentlySelectedCard != -1 )
00883       {
00884             //Get and display the card saying
00885             //Display Flower Desc
00886 
00887             uiStartLoc = FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE * + gbCurrentlySelectedCard;
00888             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( FLOR_CARD_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE);
00889 
00890             CleanOutControlCodesFromString(sTemp, sText);
00891 
00892             DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_X+10), (UINT16)(FLOWER_ORDER_SENTIMENT_BOX_Y+7), FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR,  sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00893       }
00894 */
00895       //order number
00896       usPosX = StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_ORDER_NUMBER], FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT) + 5 + FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_X;
00897       swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", LaptopSaveInfo.uiFlowerOrderNumber );
00898       DrawTextToScreen( sTemp, usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_ORDER_NUM_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00899 
00900       guiFlowerPrice = 0;
00901       // the user selected crushed bouquet
00902       if( gfFLoristCheckBox2Down )
00903             guiFlowerPrice += gubFlowerOrder_AdditioanalServicePrices[0];
00904 
00905       // the user selected blak roses
00906       if( gfFLoristCheckBox3Down )
00907             guiFlowerPrice += gubFlowerOrder_AdditioanalServicePrices[1];
00908 
00909       // the user selected wilted bouquet
00910       if( gfFLoristCheckBox4Down )
00911             guiFlowerPrice += gubFlowerOrder_AdditioanalServicePrices[2];
00912 
00913       // the user selected fruit cake
00914       if( gfFLoristCheckBox5Down )
00915             guiFlowerPrice += gubFlowerOrder_AdditioanalServicePrices[3];
00916 
00917       //price
00918       usPosX = StringPixLength( sOrderFormText[FLORIST_ORDER_PRICE], FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT) + 5 + FLOWER_ORDER_BOUQUET_NAME_X;
00919       uiStartLoc = FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TOTAL_SIZE * guiCurrentlySelectedFlower + FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE;
00920       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_GALLERY_TEXT_PRICE_SIZE);
00921       swscanf( sTemp, L"%hu", &usPrice);
00922 
00923       //if its the next day delivery
00924       if( gfFLoristCheckBox0Down )
00925             guiFlowerPrice += usPrice + FlowerOrderLocations[ gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation ].ubNextDayDeliveryCost;
00926       //else its the 'when it gets there' delivery
00927       else
00928             guiFlowerPrice += usPrice + FlowerOrderLocations[ gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation ].ubWhenItGetsThereCost;
00929 
00930       swprintf( sTemp, L"$%d.00 %s", guiFlowerPrice, pMessageStrings[ MSG_USDOLLAR_ABBREVIATION ] );
00931       DrawTextToScreen( sTemp, usPosX, FLOWER_ORDER_BOUQUET_NAME_Y, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00932 }

00973 void SelectFlowerDropDownRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00974 { 
00975       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00976       {
00977       }
00978       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00979       {
00980             gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00981             FlowerOrderDrawSelectedCity( gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation );
00982             gubFlowerDestDropDownMode = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
00983       } 
00984 }
00985 
00986 void SelectFlowerDropDownMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
00987 {
00988       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
00989       {
00990             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00991             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
00992       }
00993       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
00994       {
00995             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
00996 
00997             gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00998             FlowerOrderDrawSelectedCity( gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation );
00999 
01000             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01001       }
01002 }

01005 
01006 
01007 BOOLEAN CreateDestroyFlowerOrderDestDropDown( UINT8 ubDropDownMode )
01008 {
01009       static UINT16 usHeight;
01010       static BOOLEAN fMouseRegionsCreated=FALSE;
01011 
01012       switch( ubDropDownMode )
01013       {
01014             case  FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION:
01015             {
01016 
01017             }
01018             break;
01019 
01020             case  FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CREATE:
01021             {
01022                   UINT8 i;
01023                   UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
01024                   UINT16 usTemp;
01025                   UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT );
01026                   UINT8 ubTextFieldID;
01027 
01028                   if( fMouseRegionsCreated )
01029                   {
01030                         return(FALSE);
01031                         break;
01032                   }
01033 
01034 //Get the current text from the text box
01035                   ubTextFieldID = (UINT8) GetActiveFieldID();
01036 
01037                   //if its the personel sentiment field
01038                   if( ubTextFieldID == 1 )
01039                   {
01040                         Get16BitStringFromField( ubTextFieldID, gsSentimentTextField );
01041                   }
01042                   else if( ubTextFieldID == 2 )
01043                   {
01044                         //else its the name field
01045                         Get16BitStringFromField( ubTextFieldID, gsNameTextField );
01046                   }
01047 
01048                   SetActiveField(0);
01049 
01050 
01051 
01052                   fMouseRegionsCreated = TRUE;
01053 
01054                   usPosX = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X;
01055                   usPosY = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_Y;
01056                   for( i=0; i< FLOWER_ORDER_NUMBER_OF_DROP_DOWN_LOCATIONS; i++)
01057                   {
01058                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFlowerDropDownRegion[i], usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+4), (UINT16)(usPosX+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY+usFontHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+3,
01059                                                              CURSOR_WWW, SelectFlowerDropDownMovementCallBack, SelectFlowerDropDownRegionCallBack); 
01060                         MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFlowerDropDownRegion[i]); 
01061                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedFlowerDropDownRegion[ i ], 0, i);
01062 
01063                         usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01064                   }
01065                   usTemp = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_Y;
01066                   usHeight = usPosY - usTemp + 10;
01067 
01068 
01069                   gubFlowerDestDropDownMode = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01070               MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion); 
01071 
01072 
01073                   //disable the text entry fields
01074 //                DisableAllTextFields();
01075                         Get16BitStringFromField( 1, gsSentimentTextField );
01076                         KillTextInputMode();
01077 
01078                   //disable the clear order and accept order buttons, (their rendering interferes with the drop down graphics)
01079       }
01080             break;
01081             
01082             case  FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY:
01083             {
01084                   UINT8 i;
01085 
01086                   if( !fMouseRegionsCreated )
01087                         break;
01088 
01089                   for( i=0; i< FLOWER_ORDER_NUMBER_OF_DROP_DOWN_LOCATIONS; i++)
01090                     MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFlowerDropDownRegion[i]);
01091 
01092                   //display the name on the title bar
01093                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X+3, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y+3, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH,      FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y+FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_HEIGHT-2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01094                   DrawTextToScreen( *(FlowerOrderLocations[ gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation ].psCityLoc), FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X+6, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_Y+3, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
01095 
01096                   //enable the drop down region
01097               MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedFloristDisableDropDownRegion); 
01098 
01099                   fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01100                   fMouseRegionsCreated  = FALSE;
01101                   gubFlowerDestDropDownMode = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
01102 
01103                   //enable the text entry fields
01104                   InitFlowerOrderTextInputBoxes();
01105       }
01106             break;
01107 
01108             case  FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY:
01109             {
01110                   UINT8 i;
01111                   UINT16 usPosY, usPosX;
01112                   UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT );
01113               HVOBJECT  hImageHandle;
01114 
01115                   //Display the background for the drop down window
01116                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH,   FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y+usHeight, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01117 
01118                   //
01119                   // Place the border around the background
01120                   //
01121 
01122                   GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, guiDropDownBorder);
01123 
01124                   usPosX = usPosY = 0;
01125                   //blit top row of images
01126                   for(i=10; i< FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH-10; i+=10)
01127                   {
01128                         //TOP ROW
01129                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 1,i+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usPosY+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01130                         
01131                         //BOTTOM ROW
01132                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 6,i+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+6+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01133                   }
01134 
01135                   //blit the left and right row of images
01136                   usPosX = 0;
01137                   for(i=10; i< usHeight-10; i+=10)
01138                   {
01139                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 3,usPosX+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, i+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01140                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 4,usPosX+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH-4+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, i+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01141                   }
01142 
01143                   //blt the corner images for the row
01144                   //top left
01145                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 0, 0+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usPosY+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01146                   //top right
01147                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 2, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH-10+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usPosY+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01148                   //bottom left
01149                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 5, 0+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01150                   //bottom right
01151                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 7, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH-10+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01152 
01153 
01154                   //Display the list of cities
01155                   usPosY = FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_Y + 3;
01156                   for( i=0; i< FLOWER_ORDER_NUMBER_OF_DROP_DOWN_LOCATIONS; i++)
01157                   {
01158                         DrawTextToScreen( *(FlowerOrderLocations[i].psCityLoc), FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X+6, usPosY, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
01159                         usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01160                   }
01161 
01162                   FlowerOrderDrawSelectedCity( gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation );
01163 
01164               InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
01165             }
01166             break;
01167       }
01168       return(TRUE);
01169 }
01170 
01171 
01172 void FlowerOrderDrawSelectedCity( UINT8 ubNumber )
01173 {
01174       UINT16 usPosY;
01175       UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT );
01176 
01177       usPosY = (usFontHeight + 2) * ubNumber + FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_Y;
01178 
01179       //display the name in the list
01180       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X, usPosY+2, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH-9,    usPosY+usFontHeight+4, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 ) ) );
01181 
01182       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);     
01183       DrawTextToScreen( *(FlowerOrderLocations[ubNumber].psCityLoc), FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_CITY_START_X+6, (UINT16)(usPosY+3), 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_DROP_DOWN_FONT, 2, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED      );
01184       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01185 
01186       FlowerOrderDisplayShippingLocationCity();
01187       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);      
01188 
01189 }
01190 
01191 
01192 void FlowerOrderDisplayShippingLocationCity()
01193 {
01194       //display the name on the title bar
01195       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X+3, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y+3, FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_X+FLOWER_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_LOCATION_WIDTH,      FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y+FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_HEIGHT-2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01196       DrawTextToScreen( *(FlowerOrderLocations[ gubCurrentlySelectedFlowerLocation ].psCityLoc), FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_X+5, FLOWER_ORDER_DELIVERY_LOCATION_Y+5, 0, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_FONT, FLOWER_ORDEER_SMALL_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED     );
01197 }
01198 
01199 
01200 void InitFlowerOrderTextInputBoxes()
01201 {
01202       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
01203       wchar_t     sTemp[ 640 ];
01204       wchar_t     sText[ 640 ];
01205 
01206       
01207       InitTextInputMode();
01208       SetTextInputFont( (UINT16)FONT12ARIAL );
01209       Set16BPPTextFieldColor( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255) ) );
01210       SetBevelColors( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(136, 138, 135)), Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(24, 61, 81)) );
01211       SetTextInputRegularColors( 2, FONT_WHITE ); 
01212       SetTextInputHilitedColors( FONT_WHITE, 2, 141  );
01213       SetCursorColor( Get16BPPColor(FROMRGB(0, 0, 0) ) );
01214 
01215       AddUserInputField( FlowerOrderUserTextFieldCallBack );
01216 
01217       if( gbCurrentlySelectedCard != -1 )
01218       {
01219             //Get and display the card saying
01220             //Display Flower Desc
01221 
01222             uiStartLoc = FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE * + gbCurrentlySelectedCard;
01223             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile( FLOR_CARD_TEXT_FILE, sTemp, uiStartLoc, FLOR_CARD_TEXT_TITLE_SIZE);
01224             CleanOutControlCodesFromString(sTemp, sText);
01225 
01226             wcsncpy( gsSentimentTextField, sText, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONEL_SENTIMENT_NUM_CHARS - 1 );
01227 
01228             gbCurrentlySelectedCard = -1;
01229 
01230       }
01231 
01232       if( wcslen( gsSentimentTextField ) >= FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONEL_SENTIMENT_NUM_CHARS - 2 )
01233       {
01234             gsSentimentTextField[ FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONEL_SENTIMENT_NUM_CHARS - 1] = L'\0';
01235       }
01236 
01237       //personal sentiment box
01238       AddTextInputField( FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_BOX_Y, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_WIDTH, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONAL_SENT_TEXT_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2, gsSentimentTextField, FLOWER_ORDER_PERSONEL_SENTIMENT_NUM_CHARS, INPUTTYPE_ASCII );
01239 
01240       //Name box
01241       AddTextInputField( FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_BOX_X, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_BOX_Y, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_BOX_WIDTH, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_TEXT_BOX_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+2, gsNameTextField, FLOWER_ORDER_NAME_FIELD_NUM_CHARS, INPUTTYPE_ASCII );
01242 }
01243 
01244 void DestroyFlowerOrderTextInputBoxes()
01245 {
01246       KillTextInputMode();
01247 }
01248 
01249 
01250 void HandleFloristOrderKeyBoardInput()
01251 {
01252       InputAtom                           InputEvent;
01253 
01254       while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
01255       {
01256             if( !HandleTextInput( &InputEvent ) && InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
01257             {
01258                   UINT8 ubTextFieldID;
01259                   switch (InputEvent.usParam)
01260                   {
01261                         case ENTER:
01262 
01263                               ubTextFieldID = (UINT8) GetActiveFieldID();
01264 
01265                               //if its the personel sentiment field
01266                               if( ubTextFieldID == 1 )
01267                               {
01268                                     Get16BitStringFromField( ubTextFieldID, gsSentimentTextField );
01269                               }
01270                               else if( ubTextFieldID == 2 )
01271                               {
01272                                     //else its the name field
01273                                     Get16BitStringFromField( ubTextFieldID, gsNameTextField );
01274                               }
01275 
01276                               SetActiveField(0);
01277                               break;
01278 
01279                         case ESC:
01280                               SetActiveField(0);
01281                               break;
01282 
01283                         default:
01284                               HandleKeyBoardShortCutsForLapTop( InputEvent.usEvent, InputEvent.usParam, InputEvent.usKeyState );
01285                               break;
01286                   }
01287             }
01288       }
01289 }
01290 
01291 
01292 
01293 void FlowerOrderUserTextFieldCallBack( UINT8 ubID, BOOLEAN fEntering )
01294 {
01295       if( fEntering )
01296       {
